document.full_text: in a conference call with reporters on friday, major league soccer commissioner don garber, who has a long relationship with the wilpon family, said they "would be great owners in m.l.s."
document.title: m.l.s. would welcome wilpons as owners
lines_and_colors: in a conference call with reporters on friday, major league soccer commissioner don garber, who has a long relationship with the wilpon family, said they "would be great owners in m.l.s."
